rows: IRES-Cre-GFP inserted after the termination codon of Hsd11b2

The Cre recombinase was cloned following an IRES sequence. An frt-flanked neomycin selection cassette was added, and the construct cloned in the 3' untranslated end of the tyrosine hydroxylase gene (as described by Althini et al., 2003, J Neurosci Res 72: 444-453).
Amino acids 261-405 from the C- terminus of human 11b-HSD2
